commit message:
Version 2.3.0.
- Fixed workaround for OxygenOS (One+2)
- Add an option to disable the workaround.
- Typos in preferences.

Version 2.3.1.
- Fix bug on marshmallow when permissions are brutally removed.

Register only one BroadcastReceiver instead of many.
This caused Huawei Rio L01 (and probably other phones) to crash because of RuntimeException `regist too many Broadcast Receivers`
Optimize imports + Fix network operator settings intent for < jelly bean devices.
Fix crash on samsung devices and prevent setting a large amount of alarms.
Use Acra instead of Crashlytics and update version.
